title: Hamaru Otoko ni Keritai Onna
overview: Sitara Koichi is a man who fell out of elite life overnight. He lost his job, home and wife, his new "place of work" is an old boarding house. Under such sad circumstances, he meets Nishijima Itsuka, one of the residents of the boarding house. A slightly twisted love story begins under one roof.Based on the manga of the same name by Amasawa Aki.
